Business SetupAbudhabi

A&A Associate LLC: Your partner for seamless business setup in Abu Dhabi.

We offer expert guidance, efficient processes, and comprehensive solutions to launch and thrive in the UAE market.

Home

Establish Your Company in Abu Dhabi, the Capital of the UAE

Abu Dhabi is the capital of the United Arab Emirates. It has the second-highest population in the country, and has been termed ‘the richest city in the world’. This is not without good reason, as the 420,000 UAE nationals who call Abu Dhabi their home are worth $17 million each. Collectively, they have over $1 trillion in assets abroad. It is no wonder then, that business setup in Abu Dhabi promises to be a lucrative proposition.
The Abu Dhabi Investment Authority is the third-largest sovereign wealth fund in the world. Abu Dhabi contributes two-thirds of the UAE’s economy, which has been valued at around $400 billion. Many of the proceeds from oil are reinvested into the economy, by supporting Arab businessmen and businesswomen with their expansion plans. This makes it a lucrative opportunity for anyone wishing to do business in the UAE.

Being the capital city of the United Arab Emirates means that there almost all national-level Government agencies and Government-run companies have their headquarters in Abu Dhabi. There is a lot of scope for Abu Dhabi-based businesses to enter into lucrative contracts with these Government agencies and Government-run companies. For instance, the Abu Dhabi National Oil Company, or ADNOC for short has its headquarters in Abu Dhabi and is estimated to be a $60 billion company.

Identify Your Business Activity

Your intended business activity determines what kind of Business License you should apply for.

There are six different types of Business Licenses – Agricultural License, Commercial License, Industrial License, Occupational License, Professional License, and Tourism License.

It is to be kept in mind that one company can be engaged in more than one business activity. At present, there are more than 2,000 designated business activities specified by the Abu Dhabi Department of Economic Development or ADDED.

Establish Your Business in Abu Dhabi

Depending on the number of shareholders and the purpose for which the company is being established, there are multiple ways of setting up a new business in Abu Dhabi.

It could be any one of the following

  • Branch of Foreign Company
  • Branch of Free Zone Company
  • Branch of GCC Company
  • Branch of Local Company
  • Civil Company
  • General Partnership
  • Holding Company
  • Limited Partnership
  • Branch of GCC Company
  • Branch of Local Company
  • Civil Company
  • General Partnership

If you are not sure which kind of company would be best suited for your business needs, please get in touch with one of our expert business setup consultants in Abu Dhabi who can be of assistance.

Free Zones in Abu Dhabi

Free Zone Sector
Abu Dhabi Global Market Finance
Masdar City Green technology
Khalifa Industrial Zone Abu Dhabi Industrial
Abu Dhabi Airports Free Zone Logistics
TwoFour54 Media and Communications

The advantage of setting up your business in a free zone in Abu Dhabi is that it allows for 100% foreign ownership. You are also at liberty to repatriate 100% of your capital and profits, in addition to operating in a tax-free environment. There are no personal income taxes or corporate taxes for the first 50 years. There are also other advantages associated with free zone business setup Abu Dhabi, and a company formation expert can help you further in this regard.

Sometimes, it may make more sense to setup your business on the mainland in Abu Dhabi, where your clients will be able to access you more easily. There is always a best-fit for every business, and at A&A Associate LLC, we are committed to helping you find the right solutions for your company.

How Can You Set Up Your Company in Abu Dhabi, UAE?

The first thing to do is determine what exactly your company will be into, or in other words, what it plans to do. A specific business plan is a must because this has a bearing on the next course of action. For example, if you want to set up a paints distribution company, setting your company up as a Limited Liability Company might be a good idea. This will help limit your liability in case of an industrial accident, given that you deal with flammable materials in the course of your business.

Depending on whether you are in the B2C (Business-to-Consumer) segment or B2B (Business-to-Business) segment, you could choose to mainland business setup abu dhabi or in a free zone. If you will primarily be dealing with end users, it is important that your customers are able to access you easily. So a mainland business setup in Abu Dhabi makes more sense.

A free zone offers 100% ownership of your company. However, the company can only be a limited liability company, and limited liability companies are excluded from certain commercial activities such as banking, finance, and/or investment. For more details regarding free zone business setup Abu Dhabi, it is recommended that you get in touch with a company formation Abu Dhabi expert.

Additional permissions may be required depending on the type of commercial activity to be undertaken by the proposed company.

Why Choose an Experienced Company Formation Specialist in Abu Dhabi?

A company formation consultant who has a track record of having helped establish companies in Abu Dhabi can be an immense advantage to have in your corner. He/she will guide you on the right paperwork needed, assist you through the application process, and even help you find the right location for your office / commercial establishment.

Setting up a company is only half the work done. You need to move into a well-furnished office so that you can kickstart your business operations, and also engage in marketing so that potential clients are able to find you.

This is where we come into the picture. We not only have a team of experienced company formation experts who can help you to business setup in UAE, but also legal experts who can lend their expertise to ensure that you stay compliant with all Government regulations from time to time. We even have a team of accountants and auditors who can help you with your annual audit report, which is a mandatory requirement in the UAE.

A new business setup in Abu Dhabi, Duba, Sharjah or any of the 6 emirate requires local laws and regulation knowledge. The process should be set up with proper research on market conditions. Company formation specialists have the adequate expertise to recommend an entrepreneur to set up a business in the freezone area of Abu Dhabi and not the mainland.

 

This way, you can focus on what you do best – running your business.

Business Setup Cost in Abu Dhabi:

Embark on a successful business journey with A&A Associate LLC, your trusted partner for new business setup in Abu Dhabi. Our expert business setup consultants in Abu Dhabi provide comprehensive services customized to your needs, ensuring a seamless company setup process while considering the associated costs.

Mainland Region:

Discover the expenses involved in establishing your business in the heart of Abu Dhabi. Our business setup services cover trade license fees, office space costs, and government charges, enabling you to make informed decisions.

Free Zones:

Explore the advantages of setting up in Abu Dhabi’s free zones such as ADGM and Masdar City. Our business setup consultants detail license fees, visa expenses, and the perk of 100% ownership, empowering your entrepreneurial aspirations.

Offshore Setup:

Navigate the realm of offshore company formation in Abu Dhabi with our expert guidance. Learn about registration expenses and legal prerequisites while enjoying the flexibility to operate internationally.

Why Us?

Customised Solutions
Experienced Consultants
Hassle-Free Procedure
Multiple Payment Options

Faq

Is Abu Dhabi a good place for company setup?

Yes, Abu Dhabi is an excellent location for a company setup due to its robust economy and supportive business environment. It offers great opportunities for entrepreneurs looking to establish their businesses in the region.

How much does it cost to set up a company in Abu Dhabi?

The cost of company setup in Abu Dhabi varies depending on factors such as business type, location, and specific requirements. To get accurate cost estimates and professional guidance, it’s recommended to consult with business setup advisors specializing in business setup in Abu Dhabi.

How to start a small business in Abu Dhabi?

Starting a small business in Abu Dhabi involves several steps, including determining the business activity, legal structure, obtaining necessary licenses, and registering with relevant authorities. Please go through our detailed guide on how to start your business in Abu Dhabi.

What are the steps involved in the company formation process in Abu Dhabi's mainland?

A&A Associate LLC specializes in comprehensive business setup services, including mainland business setup Abu Dhabi, free zone business setup Abu Dhabi, and company formation Abu Dhabi. We assist with legal processes, documentation, and provide expert guidance throughout the setup journey.

Mainland vs freezone Abu Dhabi - what's the difference?

In Abu Dhabi, the mainland refers to areas where businesses can operate and trade within the local market. Free Zones, on the other hand, are designated areas that offer tax incentives, 100% foreign ownership, and simplified regulations for specific industries, making them attractive for company setup in Abu Dhabi.

What are the steps involved in the company formation process in Abu Dhabi's mainland?

Company formation in Abu Dhabi’s mainland involves several steps, including selecting a business activity, choosing a legal structure, securing a trade name, obtaining initial approvals, drafting the memorandum of association, notarizing documents, and obtaining necessary licenses.

Why should I choose Abu Dhabi for my company setup?

Abu Dhabi offers a strategic location, political stability, world-class infrastructure, and a growing economy. With a business-friendly environment, it provides access to global markets and a skilled workforce, making it an attractive choice for entrepreneurs.



Are freezone companies exempted from corporate tax in Abu Dhabi?

Yes, generally, companies operating in free zones in Abu Dhabi are exempted from corporate tax. However, it’s advisable to consult with experienced business setup advisors for the latest information and specific details based on your business activities and the chosen freezone.

What is the difference between mainland business setup and free zone business setup in Abu Dhabi?

Mainland business setup in Abu Dhabi allows you to operate anywhere in the city and beyond, with no restrictions on who your clients can be. Free zone business setup, on the other hand, provides unique benefits like 100% foreign ownership, tax exemptions, and simplified customs procedures, but comes with limitations on conducting business outside the free zone.



Can A&A Associate LLC help with obtaining licenses for my business in Abu Dhabi?

Absolutely, A&A Associate LLC specializes in helping clients obtain the required licenses for various business activities in Abu Dhabi. We guide you through the application process, ensuring compliance with regulations.
